reviewText: Great movie. I had watched it years ago so knew what it was about.

Movie-fan-tastic!!!!
I remember watching this movie in the late 80s or early 90s, and I loved it then.  Still love it now, so last year I got it from Amazon.  They just don't make action, drama movies like this anymore.  If you buy it, you won't be disappointed....IF you are a movie buff like myself.  HAPPY WATCHING!
As a VHS, I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the product.  I have not seen the movie in a decade and looked forward to it.  The wait was well worth it!
